lexUnit.name: contribute.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: give in order to help achieve or provide something.

sentence.text: In the period between the writing of The German Ideology and Capital , Marx made a living in great part by contributing articles to a radical American newspaper , The New York Daily Tribune .
